  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ClientEngine getInstance()
      Make sure that we can only get one instance of the SocketServerEngine component. Implementation of the static getInstance() method.

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws ComponentInitException
      Implementation of IComponent.initialize method(). This method is called upon initialize of the ClientEngine component and handles any configuration that needs to be done in the client before it connects to the Chat Application Server.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface IComponent
      Overrides:
      initialize in class GenericThreadedComponent
      Throws:
      ComponentInitException
      See Also:
      interface.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(ChatMessage msg)
      Method for sending a message to the server
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to be sent

    • componentMain

      public void componentMain()
      Method holding the main logic of the Client Engine. It basically waits for inputs from the user to be sent to the Server.

    • getStreamReader

      public java.io.ObjectInputStream getStreamReader()

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Override GenericThreadedComponent.shutdown() method. Signal and wait until the ClientEngine thread, holding the secure socket connection, stops.
      Specified by:
      shutdown in interface IComponent
      Overrides:
      shutdown in class GenericThreadedComponent
      See Also:
      GenericThreadedComponent
